item.title: #es @ 1525658876707803136
item.description:
Casos #COVID19 por cada 100 mil habitantes en el Perú.
En las últimas 7 semanas: Se ha mantenido constante en UN caso por cada 100 mil a nivel nacional.
En las últimas 2 semanas: 18 regiones con CERO casos por cada 100 mil habitantes.
Fuente #DatosAbiertos al 13/05. https://t.co/HP3XMoqZVg

item.title: #es @ 1525541019965595651
item.description:
🇵🇪¿Sinceramiento de cifras de hospitalización por #COVID19 ?
Ayer 13/05: 913 Hoy 14/05: 720➡️-193
Revisando los #DatosAbiertos tal parece que el sinceramiento se ha dado en la región Callao en el Hospital Negreiros de EsSalud el cual tenía casi UN año con cifras "congeladas". https://t.co/AXmiZsnCSW

item.title: #en @ 1525512022770827264
item.description:
Back in 2006, a nonprofit #opengov movement said that if information wasn't published in machine-readable #opendata, then it wasn't public.
The leadership of both parties simply waited out the reformers and continued to keep their finances locked-down.
https://t.co/ylKIBwQT7Q

阿蘇山 142回 56↗︎⚠️⚠️※ 霧島山(えびの高原(硫黄山)周辺) 11回 9⤴︎❗️ 霧島山(新燃岳) 5回 1⬆️ 桜島 1回 3↗︎‼️‼️ 薩摩硫黄島 3回→ 口永良部島 2回 1↗︎‼️ 諏訪之瀬島 7回 1⬆️

item.title: #es @ 1525208044447178755
item.description:
Una de las agendas que más he amado impulsar en Colombia es la de #DatosAbiertos. Con un equipazo en 2021 la fortalecimos e impulsamos con pasión. Hoy, que sale este reporte, #Colombia ocupa el 3er lugar en América Latina. Qué orgullo.
👏🏾 @databarometer: https://t.co/qWq2GICRbs https://t.co/Doy90K0npq

item.title: #es @ 1525154725695471616
#en @ 1525146200663642113
item.description:
We hope @galeabrewer gets details on this. Our review of NYC Open Data doesn't support @NYPDnews claims.
For Violation Codes 33 & 87, we only find about 1/10 the number of summonses that they claim to be writing. We are not aware of any other data source they could be using. 🧵 https://t.co/ukm3lEsx2H

item.title: #en @ 1525141275061547008
item.description:
Hi all! My first in person #KubeCon in 2 years ... woah.
If you want to talk: - @kubeflow/@the_samesame - Big data/Open data/ML/MLOps - Distributed systems/orchestration - Reinventing science/#DeSci/reproducibility crisis - Wine/cheese
PLEASE find me! DMs are open!

item.title: #en @ 1525141252240441344
item.description: Happy to see the USA subsample SARS-CoV-2 @nextstrain datasets public repo is live today. Kudos to Jason, @CDC_AMD and TOAST for their efforts on development, public health bioinformaticians for feedback, and sequencing labs committed to #opendata. https://t.co/EBS75Btd7f

item.title: #en @ 1525140312582242305

item.title: #es @ 1525138718171987969
item.description: Muy bueno y felicitaciones, los datos abiertos son muy importantes para que los distintos actores puedan generar nuevos análisis y abordajes. El proceso siempre es datos: si los ordenamos tenemos ➡️ información: cuando la compartimos se transforma en ➡️ conocimiento Arriba!! https://t.co/79AxNmpM2z

#2aSesionTecnologíasPNT https://t.co/P2Te8YMVDJ

item.title: #it @ 1525118612167700480
item.description:
📰 Gli #opendata tra gli assi portanti delle politiche pubbliche per l' #opengovernment. Se ne discute la prossima settimana nel corso degli appuntamenti previsti durante la Open Gov Week 2022 #ogw2022.
📋 Per i dettagli e leggi la news 👇 https://t.co/8vxMpBSx08 #opengovweek https://t.co/RDBz3cH7qu

item.title: #es @ 1525112740620148736
item.description: La agenda de Aprendizaje de la Red no se detiene!🏃El próximo 19/5 nos volvemos a encontrar en el Taller ¿Cómo explotar datos abiertos (y no tanto)? El caso de compras públicas, facilitado por @datajosem del @observafiscalcl 😎Anótate para participar aquí https://t.co/7NmrLCOoe8 https://t.co/fWX2Ma4IGC

item.title: #pt @ 1525111578223382530
item.description: Estamos discutindo filigrana sem ter, antes, garantido uma legislação que realmente induza ao investimento em infraestrutura pública de dados abertos - para, aí sim, prever casos em que a cobrança é razoável. A Lei de Governo Digital não fez isso. Estamos perdendo tempo.

item.title: #pt @ 1525111563723673601
item.description: E essa escolha estratégica precisa ser bem planejada. A infraestrutura de dados abertos tem potencial de gerar enorme valor econômico e social e isso precisa ser colocado na equação. O padrão a ser buscado deve ser esse, a cobrança deve ser exceção.

item.title: #pt @ 1525111551556042753
item.description: ... um requisito previsto, inclusive, em nossa legislação. Por isso defendemos que se trata de parte integrante do direito de acesso à informação, dentro dos princípios de dados abertos. Explicamos essa posição aqui: https://t.co/Udo58wsuUf

item.title: #pt @ 1525111549643444228
item.description: Por exemplo, a Câmara dos Deputados tem APIs para dados abertos de projetos e despesas de deputados. Graças a elas, temos iniciativas como a Operação Serenata de Amor e o Parlametria. O acesso automatizado não é um "luxo", e sim um padrão elevado de qualidade de dados abertos...

item.title: #en @ 1525106788542033920
item.description: The potential value of #OpenData for the #PublicSector is enormous, but still underused. Watch the recording of our webinar on this topic & read our latest blog post to learn more about #data demand and re-use by public entities: https://t.co/hMlmNKTQB4 https://t.co/WSyvXDf6hU

item.title: #en @ 1525105676921589760
item.description: Looking at this map... And remembering I checked each pressure/barometer/seismometer data visually :-) ... Did I say recently how much I love my "job" ? #passion #science #opendata https://t.co/NMZkFGu95L

item.title: #en @ 1525100126238552065
item.description:
We created a database with the impacts of the 2021 #flood in Germany. I am now looking for data for validation. Can anyone recommend me good datasets? (e.g. water level & flow, number of deaths per city, economic losses per city).
Any help is appreciated! #OpenData #hochwasser https://t.co/w8LoRSTIaW

item.title: #en @ 1525079669644599298
item.description: Open Data & species conservation seem to be controversial in terms of legal aspects. Today we discussed how laws as the #Umweltinformationsgesetz affect data handling in (citizen) science, public authorities. Many thanks to all participants #NFDI4Biodiversity #NFDIrocks

item.title: #en @ 1524839170530848772
item.description: We did the data collection, analysis, and paper writing within a month thanks to @SlackHQ and other collaborative tools. We were basically working around the clock with researchers from 16 countries. Open data and softwares were absolutely critical to put this work together! https://t.co/Pogr5N5qIO

item.title: #en @ 1524814094657720321
item.description:
Two years ago, @Microsoft set out to close the data divide by launching the Open Data Campaign. Today, we further that commitment through our launch of “Data for Society” – a new centralized resource for datasets that Microsoft has made open.
Read more: https://t.co/CBJ1vmgrIF

item.title: #pt @ 1524813700754022402
item.description:
Dados abertos permitem q pessoas e organizações mto bacanas verifiquem se as empresas de ônibus estão entregando aquilo q são pagas pra fazer (lembram do papo de ontem sb GPS?).
E o q elas são pagas pra fazer?
🚍 ÔNIBUS NA PARADA. 🕓 PONTUAL. 🫶 CONFIÁVEL. 🥵 SEM SUPERLOTAÇÃO.

item.title: #pt @ 1524808768202104832
item.description:
O DF, aliás, tem desde 2017 uma Política de Dados Abertos da Administração Pública (Decreto nº 38.354).
Esse decreto determinava a publicação, por todos os órgãos e entidades do DF, de um Plano de Dados Abertos, no prazo de 90 dias...
Agora, ADIVINHEM...

item.title: #es @ 1524801592519708672
item.description:

Conoce los detalles aquí ⬇️ https://t.co/6tA71oOd8i

item.title: #en @ 1524801557031575568

item.title: #en @ 1524801327594881026
item.description:
.@Microsoft is working to make data that is relevant to important social problems as open as possible, including by contributing open data ourselves.
Introducing “Data for Society”: https://t.co/sSE5Z0PG5K https://t.co/ZgboRGENBI

item.title: #pt @ 1524800967807574017
item.description:
Vocês aguentam mais um (mini) 🧶 sobre ônibus?
Quem aí já teve curiosidade de saber que informações do sistema de ônibus estão disponíveis no portal Dados Abertos DF?
Alguém chuta quantos conjuntos de dados há lá sobre o tema? 🚍

item.title: #de @ 1524792238651363331
item.description:
Das Problem ist aber: Wir haben seit 15 Jahren dieselbe Vision, bei der alles ab Schritt 4 in weiter Ferne erscheint. Und gerade in Deutschland kam nie irgendwas über 3⋆ hinaus.
Deshalb schlage ich heute eine neue Version von 5⋆ #OpenData vor.
5⋆ #OpenData 2022. https://t.co/XwPSOktWvo

item.title: #de @ 1524792234029199361
item.description:
Kennt ihr diese Unternehmensstrategien, die nach den ersten konkreten Schritten nach hinten raus einfach total unrealistisch werden?
Ich glaube das ist auch das Problem bei 5⋆ #OpenData. Leute glauben, das es OK ist nach Schritt 3 aufzuhören. Weil 3 von 5 ist ja auch schon gut. https://t.co/iAFGLS9q9K

item.title: #en @ 1524760812367368192
item.description:
Ideally, on web3 platforms, users have options of voice, loyalty, or exit.
While web2 platforms coerce user loyalty through network effects and closed data, web3 affords the opportunity to build systems that foster self-determination through digital ownership and open data.

item.description: Hey fellow comp soc scientists, aware of crypto events yes? Systemic crisis, possible tipping points (if tether..), massive collective actions, panic spreading, heated debate across social media, influencers flipping their reputation, etc. All with OPEN DATA. Just saying :)

item.title: #en @ 1524737122242117632
item.description:
In 2017, we launched @oceanprotocol, for an open data economy.
In 2018, markets hit harsh storms. We kept building. An amazing community emerged.
It's 2022. There are new storms. We're in a position to keep building, with our community. Let's do this🏗️🦈 https://t.co/lltcIHrg1W
